Top most prominent features of CodeIgniter 2021

Tagline Infotech March 26, 2021 0 Comments

CodeIgniter is an Application Development Framework – a toolkit – for people who build websites using PHP. Here are some features of CodeIgniter framework

Its goal is to enable you to develop projects much faster than you could if you were writing code from scratch, by providing a rich set of libraries for commonly needed tasks, as well as a simple interface and logical structure to access these libraries.

CodeIgniter lets you creatively focus on your project by minimizing the amount of code needed for a given task. Compared to other types of PHP frameworks, CodeIgniter is able to work with PHP4, PHP5, and above.

Why CodeIgniter?

Framework with a small footprint

CodeIgniter 3 has a 2MB download, including the user guide. CodeIgniter 4 is a 1.2MB download, plus 6MB for the user guide.

Simple solutions over complexity

CodeIgniter encourages MVC, but does not force it on you.

Clear documentation

CodeIgniter consistently outperforms most of its competitors.

Exceptional performance

CodeIgniter consistently outperforms most of its competitors.

Strong Security

We take security seriously, and with built-in protection against CSRF and XSS attacks. Version 4 adds context-sensitive escaping and CSP.

Nearly zero configuration

CodeIgniter configuration is done by convention. Putting models in a “models” folder. There is a number of configuration options available in the “config” folder.

Key Feature (MVC Architecture)

It adopts the MVC (model, view, controller) architecture.

MVC architecture in that Model refers to the data, View contains the presentation layer of your web application and controller contains the logic of your web application.

Building even large apps is more manageable with MVC, as they offer very clear code separation.

CodeIgniter allows you to take the MVC route instead of the procedural way.

This is one of the key features of CodeIgniter.

Error Handling

CodeIgniter helps to create an error-free application. It helps you detect the error functions because of, user-friendly interface.

CodeIgniter has the logging files that put your errors of application into txt format. Logs are in text format so that you can easily find errors with the line number and file name.

Providing an error function – error_reporting at the top of your index.php file. It provides you to easily detect errors to make an error-free application.

Security

An important benefit of CodeIgniter is the security feature. It provides an in-built security tool.

It includes security features are XSS Filtering, CSRF protection, Password handling, input validations, handling session data using a database or cookie encryption, and many more.

You can also define the level of security of your application. It also has some default security such as switching off runtime directives when enabling system initialization.

Unit Testing

Quality assurance is one of the important aspects of software development.

Unit testing is the most important factor in the project for quality assurance.

This Frame work’s Unit Test class is quite simple, consisting of an evaluation function and two result functions.

This Framwork PHPUnit testing assures that the overall project is simpler and easy to understand.

The Unit Test class is very simple, consisting of an evaluation function and two result functions.

Search-engine Friendly URLs

The PHP development generates clean, tidy, and search-engine-friendly URLs.

Instead of using a standard query, it is more into the use of the segment-based approach.

Providing enough flexibility to web developers provides them the benefit of presenting their web page in a more futuristic way.

It allows visitors to convert their normal URL into search-engine and SEO-friendly URLs.

Query builder

This framework gives you access to a Query Builder class.

This pattern allows information to perform CRUD operations in your database with a minimum line of code.

In some cases, only one or two lines of code are necessary to perform database operations.

A major benefit of using the Query Builder feature is that it allows you to create database-independent applications since the query syntax is generated by each database adapter.

It also allows for safer queries, since the values are escaped automatically by the system.

It has also more other features like sending mail with attachments, Image manipulation, File uploading, Benchmarking, Localization, Data encryption, pagination, and many more.
